1st March 2017 â€“ With the rapid growing of telecommunication technology, our department members from the Advanced RF & Microwave Research Group, ARFMRG took an initiative to be on track with the technological development. A course has been organized focusing on the Millimetre Wave Antenna Design and Technologies for 5G telecommunications. The two days course took place at the UTM International Campus, Kuala Lumpur from 26th to 27th December 2016. The speaker was Prof. Dr Mohamed Himdi from University of Rennes, France.
